blocks.title: Common Resume Search Words
blocks.content: Some words are more important than others to include on your resume. Our team has compiled a list of commonly searched resume key words to include on your resume.

blocks.title: Updating Your Resume
blocks.content: Getting a hiring managers attention is important. Our Team has compiled several great options for resume templates that help you present a professional document.

blocks.title: Certifications and Trainings
blocks.content: Certain careers require specific certifications and trainings. Take a look at some of the resources we have provided to help you display your certifications on your resume.

blocks.title: Things to Avoid On Your Resume
blocks.content: We have compiled a list of specific items and words we recommend you avoid when drafting a resume. To get more information on what words you should avoid on your resume click the icon above.

blocks.title: Areas to Highlight Within a Resume
blocks.content: Get Knowledge on what ares we recommend to highlight on your resume.

blocks.title: Key Sections to Include In A Resume
blocks.content: We recommend that every resume should have these sections.

blocks.title: Best Skills to Display On Your Resume
blocks.content: What skills should you display on your Resume?

blocks.title: How To Make Your Resume Stand Out
blocks.content: There are a ton of ways to help you stand out to recruiters and hiring managers. Take a look at some of the tips we recommend to make your resume stand out.

blocks.title: What To Include On A Resume
blocks.content: Take a look at the sections we recommend to include on your resume. These five sections are the most common resume sections in today's job industries.
